about_the_game:
Flowers Book

This flower themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by flowers; expect to indulge in vibrant colours, beautiful bouquets, and floral patterns.

Contents

The Flowers book unlocks the following images:
  • Rose - 23x43
  • Blue Rose - 31x38
  • Basket - 44x48
  • Sunflower - 47x48
  • Tulips - 48x42
  • Hummingbird - 48x48
  • Lily - 48x48
  • Vase - 48x48
  • Cactus - 50x62
  • Sunflowers - 54x54
  • Assorted 1 - 59x65
  • Shrub - 64x97
  • Flower - 74x94
  • Vines - 78x100
  • Corsage - 105x105
  • Rose Garden - 120x44
  • Bouquet - 120x113
  • Wreath - 121x118
  • Assorted 2 - 136x98
  • Floral Pattern - 160x68

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Flowers Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Flowers themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new flower themed levels to complete! Expect images of romantic roses, beautiful bouquets, and floral patterns.
